text: Only the Lonely is a 1991 American romantic comedy-drama movie directed by Chris Columbus and starring John Candy, Maureen O'Hara, Ally Sheedy, Anthony Quinn, Jim Belushi, Kevin Dunn. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * * * * Category:1991 romantic comedy movies Category:1991 romantic drama movies Category:1991 comedy-drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Chris Columbus Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Only the Lonely (movie)
